text: Nicholas Anthony "Nick" Micozzie (September 7, 1930 â€“ July 28, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives for the 163rd district from 1979 to 2014. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Micozzie died on July 28, 2020 from problems caused by a fall at his home in Upper Darby Township, Pennsylvania at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Pittsburgh Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Nicholas Micozzie
